00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_TYPE_TRAITS_CONTAINER_HAS_STATIC_SIZE_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_TYPE_TRAITS_CONTAINER_HAS_STATIC_SIZE_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/fwd/ptr_container.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00014 
00015 namespace boost{
00016 namespace assign{
00017 namespace v2{
00018 namespace container_type_traits{
00019 
00020         template<typename T>
00021         struct has_static_size{
00022         typedef typename T::size_type size_type;
00023         typedef char yes;
00024         typedef char (&no)[2];
00025                 typedef const size_type sig;
00026 
00027         template<typename U,sig> struct sfinae { };
00028                 template<typename U> static yes test(sfinae<U, U::static_size>*);
00029         template<typename U> static no test(...);
00030 
00031         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00032             bool,
00033             value = sizeof( test<T>(0) ) == sizeof( yes )
00034          );
00035 
00036          typedef boost::mpl::bool_<value> type;
00037     }; 
00038             
00039         template<typename T,std::size_t N,typename C>
00040     struct has_static_size< boost::ptr_array<T, N, C> > : boost::mpl::true_{};
00041 
00042 }// container_type_traits
00043 }// v2
00044 }// assign
00045 }// boost 
00046 
00047 #endif
